author: Sam-Harper
body:
This is the 91X flavour of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18541 which ended up going for 92X.

This PR is unfortunately necessary to be able to run the E/gamma HLT  efficiently with the phaseI pixels and as such needs to be 91X.
title: New E/g HLT Pixel Matching : 91X (really for 91X this time)
